text: The Script are an Irish pop rock group from Dublin. They formed in 2001. They are currently based out of London. They are signed to the Sony Label Group. Their music has been featured in video games and popular TV programs. The Script have made four albums: *The Script (2008) *Science & Faith (2010) *#3 (2012) *No Sound Without Silence (2014) These have all gone to the top of the Irish charts. They also did really well in the UK charts, with the first two albums reaching number 1 and #3 reaching the second position. Their 2012 single Hall of Fame, made with will.i.am, was a worldwide success. == References == == Other websites == *Official website Category:Musical groups established in 2001 Category:2000s Irish music groups Category:2010s Irish music groups Category:Irish pop music groups Category:Irish rock bands Category:Musical groups from Dublin
title: The Script
